chrome.notes: When saving documents, the document title is used instead of the `filename` parameter if the disposition type is `inline`. See [bug 352093465](https://crbug.com/352093465).

firefox.notes: From version 82, if an `<a>` element's `download` attribute is set (for a same-origin URL) then the `inline` directive is ignored. Earlier versions did not match the specification and respected the header directive over the attribute. See [bug 1658877](https://bugzil.la/1658877).

safari.notes: When saving documents, the document title is used instead of the `filename` parameter if the disposition type is `inline`. See [bug 18384](https://webkit.org/b/18384).
